original_text: They broke the special stone pillar of Baal and they destroyed the temple. People still use it as a toilet, even today!
korean_text: 바알의 목상을 헐며 바알의 신당을 헐어서 변소를 만들었더니 오늘까지 이르니라

sentences.original_text: They broke the special stone pillar of Baal
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 바알의 특별한 돌 기둥을 부쉈습니다

sentences.original_text: People still use it as a toilet
